system.model

Class CustomGesture

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leapmotion.leap.Interface
      • com.leapmotion.leap.Gesture
        • system.model.CustomGesture
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicGesture, StaticGesture

    public abstract class CustomGesture
extends com.leapmotion.leap.Gesture
    This abstract class of custom gesture extend from Leap Motion Gesture. Each gesture has its own state and is Enable or not. Each gesture has his own gesture threshold to maintain smoother performance.
    Version:
    1.2
    Author:
    Andy Tsang

        Abstract method check by the hand post. Condition change depends on gesture.

        public abstract void performAction()
        Abstract method perform action mapped with this gesture. Action change depends on gesture.

      • printTest

        public boolean printTest()
        Function in checking counter with threshold to stop printing every frame.
        Returns:
        boolean if the counter = threshold true return to allow printing

      • checkRecogniseThreshold

        public boolean checkRecogniseThreshold()
        Function in checking counter with threshold to stop performing action every frame. Threshold might affect the smoothness of action
        Returns:
        boolean if the counter = threshold true return to allow perform

      • updateState

        public void updateState(boolean end)
        Function to update the state of the gesture.
        Parameters:
        end - if end is true the state will change from update to stop
